_sText:
Basically, this is going to be a back to basics zombie mod map, With roots from lila pan!c, Omi_facility, ocx ORLY, Atix day, and a few others.


Everything that was a big "hit" in these maps will be re-created in my own vision inside this one.

What to expect.

- Gun room (who doesnt like gun rooms? srsly..)
- Lots of couches and vending machines
- classic barricade room
- cargo containers
- boxes
- camp spots
- Hidden areas, secrete rooms
- Fully optimized

What NOT to expect

- Vents
- Pipes
- Insanely cheap spots
- Escape version of this map
- Custom texture (i want this to be a small file size map for EZ-DL)




The general idea was to re-create a map after what zombie mod used to be, back before 2.0, before cars and trucks, escape maps, and aliens.
Part of project GL33m4x's stuff, Added 1 day ago, last modified 7 hours ago, 4 comments, 146 views, 0 stamps
